title: Death  to  Spies
description:
Title: Death to Spies
Genre: 3rd-person / shooter / stealth
Released: 16th October 2007
Developer: Haggard Games
Publisher: 1C Company
Description:
As a member of the Soviet counterintelligence group SMERSH it is your mission to help turn the tide of this war in the favor of the motherland. You've been trained to infiltrate, execute and assassinate with prejudice.

While you'll have access to both Russian weapons and their German counterparts, it would be in your favor to kill in silence and arouse no suspicion from surrounding guards. Capturing enemy uniforms is paramount to infiltrating hostile territory since uniforms stained with Nazi blood will get you noticed and killed. Your choke cord and chloroform will be your best friends - know them well.

The enemy is not blind. You must be on your toes to remain unnoticed. They will raise alarms if you're spotted and the missions will require you to go far behind enemy lines. Remember, there will be no comrades to pull you out of the fire.

You are all alone and death comes easily to spies.

How to play:
1) Mount or burn disc image DTS.iso;
2) Run setup.exe and install the game (or use the autorun menu if it opens);
3) Launch the game using its main executable or shortcuts (DRM free).

If you like the game, BUY it!
